name: @ulixee/apps-chromealive
description: ChromeAlive! powers iterative Ulixee Hero web scraping in the Chrome browser.
author: Data Liberation Foundation

scripts.build: yarn build:ui && cd ../../build/apps/chromealive && yarn && electron-builder install-app-deps
scripts.build:ui: yarn workspace @ulixee/apps-chromealive-ui build && yarn workspace @ulixee/apps-chromealive-extension build
